entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
